title: Chris Collins Says John Lewis Is ‘Like a Spoiled Chimp That Got Too Many Bananas’?
subtitle: A racist jibe purportedly directed at civil rights icon Rep. John Lewis by Trump transition team member Rep. Chris Collins was fabricated by a fake news web site.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Rep. Chris Collins, a member of President-elect Donald Trump's transition team, compared civil rights icon Rep. John Lewis to "a spoiled chimp who got too many bananas and rights."
